ns9:component-version-script.script:
# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic AD insertions $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD $DJANGO_DB_NAME $VSX_SALT_FORMULA $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
/usr/bin/yum -y install git
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > /srv/pillar/settings.sls << _EOF_ debug: True dbengine: django.db.backends.mysql dbname: $DJANGO_DB_NAME dbuser: $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME dbpassword: $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD dbhost: $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME dbport: 3306 django_app: $VSX_SALT_FORMULA _EOF_
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

ns9:component-version-script.script:
# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic insertions from AD $MYSQL_PASSWORD $MYSQL_USER $MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST $MYSQL_DB_NAME
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install MySQL-python git
echo "Starting configuration of Salt masterless setup"
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls << _EOF_ mysql_user: $MYSQL_USER mysql_password: $MYSQL_PASSWORD mysql_db: $MYSQL_DB_NAME _EOF_
remote_host_array='mysql_remote_host:\n' for (( i=0;i<${#MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[@]}; i++)); do remote_host_array+=" - ${MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[$i]}\n" done
/bin/echo -e $remote_host_array >> $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls mysql
exit 0

task.content:
# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
$VSX_SALT_FORMULA
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic AD insertions $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD $DJANGO_DB_NAME $VSX_SALT_FORMULA $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
/usr/bin/yum -y install git
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > /srv/pillar/settings.sls << _EOF_ debug: True dbengine: django.db.backends.mysql dbname: $DJANGO_DB_NAME dbuser: $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME dbpassword: $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD dbhost: $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME dbport: 3306 django_app: $VSX_SALT_FORMULA _EOF_
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic AD insertions $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD $DJANGO_DB_NAME $VSX_SALT_FORMULA $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
/usr/bin/yum -y install git
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > /srv/pillar/settings.sls << _EOF_ debug: True dbengine: django.db.backends.mysql dbname: $DJANGO_DB_NAME dbuser: $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME dbpassword: $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD dbhost: $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME dbport: 3306 django_app: $VSX_SALT_FORMULA _EOF_
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
$VSX_SALT_FORMULA
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic insertions from AD $MYSQL_PASSWORD $MYSQL_USER $MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST $MYSQL_DB_NAME
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install MySQL-python git
echo "Starting configuration of Salt masterless setup"
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls << _EOF_ mysql_user: $MYSQL_USER mysql_password: $MYSQL_PASSWORD mysql_db: $MYSQL_DB_NAME _EOF_
remote_host_array='mysql_remote_host:\n' for (( i=0;i<${#MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[@]}; i++)); do remote_host_array+=" - ${MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[$i]}\n" done
/bin/echo -e $remote_host_array >> $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls mysql
exit 0

ns9:component-version-script.script:
# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic AD insertions $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD $DJANGO_DB_NAME $VSX_SALT_FORMULA $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
/usr/bin/yum -y install git
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > /srv/pillar/settings.sls << _EOF_ debug: True dbengine: django.db.backends.mysql dbname: $DJANGO_DB_NAME dbuser: $DJANGO_DB_USERNAME dbpassword: $DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD dbhost: $DJANGO_DB_HOSTNAME dbport: 3306 django_app: $VSX_SALT_FORMULA _EOF_
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls $VSX_SALT_FORMULA
exit 0

exit 0

ns9:component-version-script.script:
# Import global conf . $global_conf
## This script is tested on CentOS 6.4
SALT_ROOT=/srv/salt PILLAR_ROOT=/srv/pillar
# Dynamic insertions from AD $MYSQL_PASSWORD $MYSQL_USER $MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST $MYSQL_DB_NAME
/bin/echo 'n3wpass' | /usr/bin/passwd --stdin root /usr/sbin/sshd -p443
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install MySQL-python git
echo "Starting configuration of Salt masterless setup"
if [ ! -d /tmp/salt-vsx ] ; then echo "Creating /tmp/salt-vsx" mkdir -p /tmp/salt-vsx fi
/usr/bin/git clone $VSX_SALT_FORMULA_URL /tmp/salt-vsx
if [ ! -d $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA ] ; then echo "Creating $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA" mkdir -p $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA fi
if [ ! -d $PILLAR_ROOT ] ; then echo "Creating Pillar dir" mkdir -p $PILLAR_ROOT fi
mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/file_root/* $SALT_ROOT/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA mv /tmp/salt-vsx/$VSX_SALT_FORMULA/pillar_root/* $PILLAR_ROOT
/bin/cat > $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls << _EOF_ mysql_user: $MYSQL_USER mysql_password: $MYSQL_PASSWORD mysql_db: $MYSQL_DB_NAME _EOF_
remote_host_array='mysql_remote_host:\n' for (( i=0;i<${#MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[@]}; i++)); do remote_host_array+=" - ${MYSQL_REMOTE_HOST[$i]}\n" done
/bin/echo -e $remote_host_array >> $PILLAR_ROOT/settings.sls
if [ ! -x /usr/bin/salt-call ] ; then echo "Salt did not install correctly. Exiting with failure!" exit 1 fi
/usr/bin/salt-call --local state.sls mysql
exit 0
